mapper.select: /* USE : FnkeyCmNmcdMapper.getNmcodeGrpCdList */ SELECT A.NMCODE_GRP_CD AS VALUE , NVL((SELECT '[' || NMCODE_CD || '] ' || NMCODE_NM FROM TB_CM_NMCODE WHERE NMCODE_GRP_CD = '000' AND NMCODE_CD = A.NMCODE_GRP_CD), '[' || A.NMCODE_GRP_CD || ']') AS NAME FROM TB_CM_NMCODE A GROUP BY A.NMCODE_GRP_CD ORDER BY VALUE ASC
